entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING, Fort Frances
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:24 a.m. EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -5.7Â°C

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and local blowing snow. Amount 10 to 20 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late this afternoon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 16 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 late this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Flurries. High minus 3.
